content.rendered:
The MAXTRAX Recovery Tracks Bag is designed and engineered for exploring.

The heavy duty, four layer, weather resistant carry bag provides functional and stylish storage for your MAXTRAX MK2, or XTREME – keeping mud, sand, dirt and snow out of your vehicle. The dynamic bag will safely store up yo 4 MAXTRAX Mk2 or XTREME.

Externally the zippers have provisions for the use of a padlock; internally the bright safety orange material is teamed with the protective black mesh, protecting the tracks and the bag from all environmental weather factors.

(MAXTRAX NOT INCLUDED). *Sized for MAXTRAX MKII and XTREME only.

Weight: 2kg.
Size: A spacious 1200mm x 340mm wide bag.
Colour: Black.
Please note: Actual colour may vary slightly from images shown.
Warranty: We back our confidence in this quality product with a 12 month warranty against faulty materials and workmanship. Shipping: We CAN’T ship this product to Post Office Boxes.
Australian orders: Shipping cost is automatically calculated when ordering.
International orders: Shipping cost is manually calculated once your order is received. You will be advised by email the total cost of your order including shipping (International shipping is NOT free).

excerpt.rendered: MAXTRAX Black Carry Bag
